Description_lang: Let the Scourge coarse through and corrupt you consuming all Lost Souls, transforming into a Lich for $415033d. During this time you periodically deal $415006s2 Frost damage split between nearby enemies. After $415006s10 sec unleash of wave of shadows Fearing nearby enemies for $415038d. The duration of the Fear is reduced for each nearby enemy down to 0.5 sec against $415006s12 or more targets.
